question: Which of the following national parks is not a UNESCO World Heritage site?
explanation: Kanha National Park is one of the tiger reserves of India and the largest national park of Madhya Pradesh. It is not a UNESCO World Heritage. A World Heritage Site is a landmark or area which has been officially recognized by the United Nations, specifically by the United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization (UNESCO). Kaziranga, Sundarbans and Keoladeo national parks have been included in the UNESCO World Heritage.
